level 1.name: Basic Striking
level 1.description: Add + TEC/2 to damage on Unarmed Strike. Gain another Unarmed Strike card

level 1.name: Judo 101
level 1.description: Change the DC of Unarmed Strike to MAX(STR, TEC) instead of STR-2.

level 2.name: Judo+
level 2.description: Add EMP/2 to the DC of Unarmed Strike. Add 2 to the flip of unarmed strike. Choose any two effects from Unarmed strike, instead of one

level 2.name: Strike+
level 2.description: Add + 1 damage on Unarmed Strike. Gain another Unarmed Strike card
level 2.special: May be taken repeatedly. Each time taken doubles (expontentially) the cost

level 2.name: Dodge Roll
level 2.description: If you move two spaces on a dodge and make the check, you may move a third space in the same direction

code.Extras: and move a third space in the same direction

level 3.name: Artful Dodger
level 3.description: Add +1 to combo for Dodge. Gain another two dodge cards
